class Host[source]

Host(name:str, port:int) :: BaseModel

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Usage

{% raw %} 
host = Host(name="localhost", port=8001)
print(host.port)

8001
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
host = Host(name="foobar", port=8001)
assert host.name == "foobar"
assert host.port == 8001
{% endraw %}
